title: Bristol Myers' Cancer Breakthrough Breyanzi Just Won Its Fifth FDA Approval
description: On Thursday, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved Bristol Myers Squibb & Co.’s (NYSE:BMY) Breyanzi (lisocabtagene maraleucel; liso-cel), a CD19-directed chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cell therapy, for adult patients with relapsed or refrac…
